amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for an East Coast Missile defense site by $70.2 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 20 printed in House Report 113-170 to cut $70 million of unrequested funds for the East Coast Missile Defense site and dedicates that funding to deficit reduction instead.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 249 (Roll no. 384).
